cyclone.name: IDALIA
cyclone.current_location: about 85 mi N of the western tip of Cuba and 370 mi SSW of Tampa, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north, then turning north-northeast across the eastern Gulf toward the Florida Big Bend and the southeast U.S. coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend (between Indian Pass and the Middle of Longboat Key, FL)

weather_observation.watch_coast: N/A – no watches posted west of Indian Pass, FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: N/A – no warnings posted west of Indian Pass, FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Big Bend, FL west coast, eastern FL Panhandle, GA and Carolinas coastline – well east of Mobile, AL
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible with occasional gusts below tropical-storm force (generally <39 mph)
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along Mobile Bay; significant surge confined well east of the port
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate outer-band showers possible; heavy rainfall core stays east toward Florida Big Bend
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated surf and rip-current risk along the central Gulf Coast
